title: F1.2014.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:

Genre : Racing / Simulator / 3D
Developer : Codemasters
Publisher : Codemasters

Processor : Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.4Ghz or AMD Athlon X2 5400+
Memory : 2 GB
Video : AMD HD2600 or NVIDIA Geforce 8600
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectXÃ‚Â® 9.0

Game information:  

Feel the power of new cars FORMULA ONE Ã¢â€žÂ¢ with turbocharging in the most
accessible to date computer game dedicated FORMULA 1 Ã¢â€žÂ¢.

In F1 Ã¢â€žÂ¢ 2014 you expect all the drivers, cars and tracks from the World
Championship in the class of FORMULA 1 Ã¢â€žÂ¢ season in 2014, including new
tracks in Russia and Austria, and the return of the German Hockenheimring
FORMULA 1 GULF AIR BAHRAIN GRAND PRIX - a new tournament, which appeared
in 2014, year. The new evaluation system drivers, adjust the game to your
level, revised management, lightweight career opportunities, as well as a
new level of complexity "Very light" will open the world of FORMULA 1 Ã¢â€žÂ¢
even for absolute beginners. Experienced players can customize the game
so as to fully experience the severe requirements for drivers FORMULA ONE.
Advanced mode scenarios, extensive multiplayer capabilities and play together
on one screen improve F1 2014 FORMULA ONE recreating the world for loyal fans
and newcomers to the series.

Game Features:  

New trails - compete at the Spilberk in Austria, "Sochi Circuit" in the Russian
and German Hockenheimring and other routes.

GULF AIR BAHRAIN GRAND PRIX - new night tournament, which appeared in this year.

All the cars, all the stars - the game includes all of the latest drivers and cars 2014 season.

A variety of opportunities for online play - show yourself in a race with a friend on the
same screen or online with 16 other riders and 6 computer players.

Evaluation system drivers - the new system, which came to replace the in-game Young Driver
Test, adjusts the game to the level of the driver.

RACENET - share your victories and participate in competitions in RACENET,
free online center.

Meet the ERS - the new kinetic energy recovery system, which came to replace KERS.
Thanks ERS racers get control of the vehicle and overtaking opportunities - feel
like it has changed the race.

Advanced mode scenarios - Complete a variety of scenarios based on real-life situations,
and get special rewards.

Revised management - improved physics, combined with the revised control, will give players
using gamepads, the most authentic feeling of control fireballs.

Supercharged Formula 1 - experience the pristine power of the new engines with turbochargers
FORMULA ONE.
Advanced career mode - participate in a full season FORMULA ONE, or select one of the truncated
variants.


RePack Features:  

F1 2014
